title: Blue City Crime | Fox News
description: Follow breaking news and the latest updates on crime in major U.S. cities. Get reporting on public safety, policing challenges and crime trends.

Blue city perp with 50+ arrests accused of pushing stranger onto train tracks in fifth attack that day: report
Driver who mowed down blue city officer, yelled, ‘F--- these cops,’ sparks outrage over light sentence
California jail cuts Seattle murder suspect loose by mistake, triggering manhunt as victim’s mom fumes

paragraphs: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. ©2025 FOX News Network, LLC. All rights reserved. Quotes displayed in real-time or delayed by at least 15 minutes. Market data provided by Factset. Powered and implemented by FactSet Digital Solutions. Legal Statement. Mutual Fund and ETF data provided by Refinitiv Lipper.
Chicago serial attack suspect William Livingston charged again for allegedly striking two women, continuing a decade-long pattern of random assault arrests.
Repeat violent offender Reginald Lively receives life sentence for brutal Baltimore murder, marking his third murder conviction since 1986 in shocking case.
North Carolina ranks 9th nationally for human trafficking with 301 cases in 2024. Charlotte serves as a major hub due to interstate highways and gang activity.
Houston murder case involving repeat offender Gabriel Menefee reignites debate over Harris County bail practices and release of violent criminals with long records.
Homeless man with lengthy criminal history allegedly stabbed bus passenger near the heart in Charlotte. Victim Jose Mulongo nearly died from multiple wounds in transit attack.
Berkeley police arrest suspect in disturbing sorority house invasion using surveillance video and license plate technology after three-hour break-in spree.
Surveillance video shows arrest of suspect who fatally stabbed Ukrainian woman on Charlotte Area Transit System train in random attack in August.
Vietnam veteran George Karkoc, 79, suffers broken legs defending female neighbor from naked home invader in Studio City. The suspect was shot dead.
Habitual criminal Vance Patton's 25 prison sentences span four decades of burglaries, highlighting Chicago's ongoing struggle with repeat offenders.
Texas man avoids jail in child sex assault case after plea deal drops nine felony charges. Victim's father says he was blindsided by Travis County prosecutor's decision.
Chicago police hunt suspect who stabbed woman on UIC Blue Line platform Saturday night. Victim hospitalized in good condition after unprovoked attack near university.
Carjacker who targeted senior citizen's Rolls-Royce while on parole for weapons charge receives 10-year sentence in Chicago, Illinois, police said.
California's mental health diversion law has gone beyond the gates of its original intent, allowing violent criminals to avoid prison, warns Sacramento sheriff.
Tragic Chicago jewelry store robbery leaves father and son dead in Little Village. Faustino Alamo, 63, and Luis Alamo, 25, died after suspect fled.
Fatal violence strikes Washington, D.C., as three people killed in homicides during Trump's declared war on capital crime. Police probe separate shooting incidents.
Donald Trump's criminal justice reform agenda advances with the Safer Supervision Act, building on First Step Act successes to focus resources on violent threats.
Nebraska felon released under Biden clemency program arrested iafter Omaha shooting, sparking debate over criminal justice reform and public safety concerns nationwide.
Joe Rogan and Elon Musk criticize North Carolina's judicial system after magistrate judge released suspect who later allegedly killed Iryna Zarutska on train.
Fall River police arrest 5 people after massive street takeover involving 50-100 riders on motorcycles, ATVs and dirt bikes disrupting traffic across the city.
North Carolina man and repeat offender Trivius Crouch released from jail on $20,000 bond over alleged violent gunpoint attack in Charlotte despite nine arrests.
Repeat offender with over 50 prior arrests goes on alleged violent crime spree targeting Asian victims across Manhattan, including subway platform assault.
A 25-year-old woman received a two-year prison sentence after pleading guilty to assault for hitting an NYPD officer with her Lexus in an attack caught on video.
The Contra Costa County Sheriff's Office accidentally released Isaiah Jamon Andrews, wanted for allegedly murdering Theodore Wheeler IV, prompting U.S. Marshals to launch manhunt.
A wave of reported shootings in Washington, D.C., left 12 victims, including a 5-year-old boy, with police arresting two suspects and recovering three guns near Howard University.
White House touts D.C. crime crackdown as national blueprint, combining National Guard forces with stronger prosecution to tackle violent crime across America.
Boston's deadly crime surge, with a 143% jump in homicides this year, exposes consequences of weak law enforcement policies, victims' rights advocate warns.
Baltimore police arrested Raymond Willis Lunn after he allegedly attacked a 19-year-old student on Johns Hopkins University campus in October.
An expert says investigators are likely exploring multiple theories in the shooting death of Condor Club general manager Mark Calcagni, from targeted attack to robbery gone wrong.
A North Carolina man who is accused in the murder of a 51-year-old has been arrested over 40 times since 2012, according to records reviewed by Fox News Digital.
Mayor Christina Fugazi's Stockton home was hit by a stray bullet during what her office called a gang-related shooting that wounded two teenagers over the weekend.

This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. ©2025 FOX News Network, LLC. All rights reserved. Quotes displayed in real-time or delayed by at least 15 minutes. Market data provided by
        Factset. Powered and implemented by
        FactSet Digital Solutions.

        Refinitiv Lipper.
